name: 胡同來
objective: 本課程目的在於使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、衡量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
schedule:
1.　　Research Methods: An Overview
2.　　Social Science Research(I)
3.　　Social Science Research(II)
4.　　Theory Construction
5.　　Research Problem and Hypothesis
6.　　Constructs, Variables and Definitions
7.　　Measurement Theory and Scaling Methods(I)
8.　　Measurement Theory and Scaling Methods(II)
9.　　Research Design (I)
10.　　Research Design (II)
11.　　Research Design (III)
12.　　Survey Research (I)
13.　　Survey Research (II)
14.　　Data Analysis (I)
15.　　Data Analysis (II)
16.　　Inferences and Interpretations
17.　　Ethics in Social Science Research
scorePolicy:
Class Participation　　25%
Individual Work　　30 %
Term Pape　　45%
materials:
Text:
Frankfort-Nachmias, Chava and David Nachmias (2001), Research Methods in the Social Science, 6th ed., NY: St. Martin’s Press.

Ref.:
Cavana, Robert Y., Brian L. Delahaye, Uma Sekaran (2001), Applied Business Research:Qualitative and Quantative Methods , 3th ed.,NY: John Wiley & Sons Inc.
Churchill,Gilbert A. Jr. and Dawn Iacobucci (2010), Marketing Research-Methodological Foundations, 10th ed., Thomson South-Western Publishers..
Cooper, Donald R. and Pamela S. Schindler (20 13),Business Research Methods ,12th ed., NY: McGraw-Hill.
Sekaran, Uma and Roger Bougie (2013), Research Methods for Business : A Skill Building Approach , 6th ed.,NY: John Wiley & Sons Inc.
